characters.name: Unicorn
characters.description: A magical creature with a slender, graceful body, shiny white coat, and a flowing mane of shimmering rainbow colors. It has a spiraled, golden horn on its forehead and sparkling, deep blue eyes.

scenes.background_description: A serene meadow painted in the golden hues of sunrise, where morning mist lingers lightly above the ground. At the center, a sparkling brook runs through lush, emerald grass, and wildflowers provide vibrant pops of color. The scene is dreamily illustrated in the classic storybook style, emphasizing soft, whimsical pastels.
scenes.narration_text: In the heart of the dawn-kissed meadow, a majestic unicorn takes gentle, graceful steps, its horn glinting in the early light.

scenes.background_description: A wooded path bathed in the dappled light of late morning, where towering pines stretch towards the sky with a carpet of soft needles underfoot. The forest feels alive with the sound of rustling leaves and birdsong, captured in a storybook illustration style with delicate, inviting colors.
scenes.narration_text: The unicorn continues its journey, meandering along a sunlit path through an ancient forest alive with the melodies of nature.
